dummydata.body: A Lion lay asleep in the forest, when a little Mouse came upon him unexpectedly...
Once, a Tortoise challenged a Hare to a race. The Hare laughed at the idea of being outrun...
A Crow was sitting on a branch with a piece of cheese in her beak. A hungry Fox saw her...
In a field one summer's day a Grasshopper was hopping about, singing and chirping...
There once was a shepherd boy who cried out that a wolf was attacking his sheep, but it was a lie...
A Cat laid a trap for some Mice, but they were clever and managed to escape every time...
A Dog, looking into a river, saw his own reflection and thought it was another Dog with a bigger bone...
A Candle stayed strong against the Wind, but the Wind blew fiercely, and the Candle flickered out...
A Frog saw an Ox and wanted to make himself as big as the Ox. He puffed up until he burst...
A hungry Wolf spotted a Lamb and devised a plan to catch him, only to find himself challenged...
